description: Jersey Bulls' Combined Counties Premier South play-off campaign will begin on Saturday, 24 May.
title: Jersey Bulls set for Combined Counties Premier South play-off semi-final
title_page: Jersey Bulls set for Combined Counties Premier South play-off semi-final  - BBC Sport
maintext:
Jersey Bulls' Combined Counties Premier South play-off campaign will begin on Saturday, 24 May.
Bulls will host either Cobham or Fleet Town at Springfield, depending on the outcome of an appeal by Redhill.
Redhill, who won the title, have been docked three points for fielding an ineligible player in March and, should their appeal fail, FA Vase finalists Whyteleafe will become the title winners and Redhill will drop to third place.
If that happens, Fleet Town will visit Springfield. However, if Redhill win the appeal and retain the points and title, Cobham will be Bulls' opponents.
